Sentence: During a visit to Paris as part of the Guatemalan political organization known as ', "``the 31 January Popular Front,''  (Rigoberta/RigobertaMenchu)', 'Rigoberta Menchu meets Venezuelan anthropologist Elisabeth Burgos-Debray and agrees to tell her (Menchu) life story so that it can be transformed into a book
The two work feverishly for several days, Burgos-Debray questioning Rigoberta, who tells her (Rigoberta) story in Spanish, her (Rigoberta) second language
The result is several hours' worth of recorded interviews that Burgos-Debray transcribes and arranges as I, Rigoberta Menchu
